roleset.name: (cause to) become a darker brown color
roleset.note: TAN-V NOTES: Frames file for 'tan' based on sentences in wsj; adjectival 'tan' found in Verbnet entry other_cos-45.4. (from tan.01-v)
TANNING-N NOTES: Based on Thyme and Sharp data. Comparison to tan.01. Tan.01 is a member of Vncls other_cos-45.4. Framed by Katie. (from tanning.01-n)

role.descr: description of tan, attribute of arg1

example.name: tanned-j
example.text: At the ritzy Fashion Island Shopping Center, the tanned and elegant ladies of this wealthy Southern California beach community disembark from their Mercedes-Benzes and BMWs for another day of exercising their credit cards.

example.name: tan-v
example.text: Three weeks of slaving away in the hot sun tanned John a deep purple.
example.arg: Three weeks of slaving away in the hot sun

example.name: tanning-n: args 0 and 1
example.text: He witnessed the daily craft-making of his mother and grandmother, their sewing of moccasins, their tanning of hides.

roleset.name: tan in color
roleset.note: TAN-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from tan.01-j)

role.descr: description of tan, attribute of arg1

example.name: tan-j
example.text: The surface is tan , granular and grossly intact with focal scanty tan membranous adhesions .
example.arg: with focal scanty tan membranous adhesions
